meta_description: Explore Art & Culture at Toledo Museum - Join Us!
hours_text:
# Plan Your Visit

Welcome to TMA

**General admission is free.**

Parking is free for all museum visitors.  
Special Exhibitions are $10.  
TMA is open every Wednesday through Sunday.

## Jump To

## Page Navigation

## Hours

**Gallery Renovations in Progress.** TMA is [reimagining the gallery experience](https://toledomuseum.org/reimagining-our-galleries) starting in 2025 with a planned completion date of late 2027. Some of our galleries will be closed during the renovation project and some artworks will be off view.

Please view our museum map for list of open galleries. 

[Museum Map](https://d8ogbgki59nh9.cloudfront.net/tma_20251121-visitormap_letter.pdf)

####   
**What’s Open**

**The museum remains open! You can enjoy:**

  * Classic Court

  * Wolfe Gallery

  * The Robert C. and Susan Savage Community Gallery

  * The Glass Pavilion

  * The Family Center

  * Education Wing (Classes are still happening!)

  * TMA Café, TMA Store, and Library

Restrooms, elevators, and visitor entrances stay open. Signs will help guide you during your visit.

**Hoping to see a particular artwork during your visit?** Call us to confirm it is on view. 419-255-8000  

#### **What’s Changing**

  * On December 15, 2025, The Great Gallery and Galleries 22, 23, 24, 26, 27, 32, 33, and 34 closed for renovation.

  * Galleries 29 and 31 are already closed.

  * Levis Gallery closed after [_Rachel Ruysch: Nature Into Art_](/exhibitions/rachel-ruysch-nature-into-art) ended on July 27, 2025.
...

## Exhibitions

### Radiance and Reverie: Jewels from the Collection of Neil Lane

#### Current

  * October 18, 2025 to January 18, 2026

[View Exhibition](/exhibitions/radiance-and-reverie-jewels-from-the-collection-of-neil-lane)

### Craig Fisher: Lines of Discovery, Expressions in Copper

#### Current

  * November 19, 2025 to January 25, 2026

[View Exhibition](/exhibitions/craig-fisher-lines-of-discovery-expressions-in-copper)

### Cursed! The Power of Magic in the Ancient World

#### Upcoming

  * March 21, 2026 to July 5, 2026

[View Exhibition](/exhibitions/cursed-the-power-of-magic-in-the-ancient-world)
